Welcome To My World

A look inside the personal and professional persuits that make up my life

Explore

I specialize in

building relationships with business partners and consumers

Project Coordination

Build and maintain strong relationships with partners of all sizes, liaising with clients and in-house sales and production teams to ensure contractual, logistical, and relationship needs are met or exceeded

Problem Solving

Four years of finding creative and positive solutions to a wide range of technical and logistical problems in the high-pressure environment of “live” sports broadcast

Competitive Nature

Four years of DI Track and Field (1500m, Decathlon) and XC, former Zone qualifying age-group swimmer, and category 2 competitive cyclist

Website Design

Currently learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript wed development/design languages.
